meta_description:
meta_parent_section.meta_name of the values (meta_type=type-value) where this meta_info_entry is used.
The kind of use depends on the current meta_type:
* type-section: refer to the values directly contained in this section, those that have this section as meta_parent_section.
* type-abstract: the values that have this abstract type.

This is an extra information generated for a schema derived from a dictionary.
